examples: Regular exercise is essential for good fitness.
She's working on her fitness for the marathon.
Do you play soccer?
Soccer is a very popular sport worldwide.

explanation.meaning: (pl. stadiums or stadia) 体育场；运动场
examples: The concert was held in a large stadium.
Thousands of fans packed the stadium for the game.
Boxing is a physically demanding sport.
He trains every day for his boxing matches.
She enjoys playing badminton in her free time.
Badminton requires quick reflexes.
He's training for his first marathon.
Running a marathon is a huge accomplishment.

explanation.meaning: 比赛项目；大事；公开活动
examples: The long jump is a track and field event.
The charity gala was a major social event.
Why don't you come along with us?
How's your project coming along?
Come along, we'll be late!
We're going on a ski trip this winter.
She learned to ski when she was young.
They went skiing in the Alps.
Our city will host the next Olympic Games.
He will host the talk show tonight.

explanation.meaning: 主人；东道主；节目主持人
examples: The host greeted their guests warmly.
Brazil was the host nation for the World Cup.
She's a popular TV host.
The runners lined up on the track.
We followed the animal's tracks in the snow.
The train runs on the track.
The police tracked the suspect to his hideout.
We tracked the progress of the storm.
She excels in track and field events.
Many athletes compete in track and field.
I go to the gym three times a week.
The school has a new gym.
She started gymnastics at a young age.
Gymnastics requires great flexibility and strength.
He works out at the gym every morning.
Can you work out the answer to this problem?
We need to work out a solution.
The hot weather made me sweat.
He sweated through his shirt.
I started to sweat during the long run.
Sweat was dripping down his face.
He wiped the sweat from his brow.
He worked hard to make it in the music industry.
I hope I can make it to the meeting on time.
The legend says that a dragon lives in the cave.
He is a living legend in the sports world.
The Olympic athlete won three gold medals.
She is a dedicated athlete.
He's a master of chess.
The dog waited for its master.
She quickly mastered the new software.
It takes years to master a foreign language.
Parents should set a good example for their children.
He tries to set an example of good sportsmanship.
It was a great honour to meet her.
We should show honour to our elders.
She accepted the award with honour.
The team played for glory and victory.
He brought glory to his country.
She won a gold medal in the swimming competition.
He was awarded a medal for bravery.

explanation.meaning: 锦标赛；冠军赛；冠军称号
examples: The team won the national championship.
They are competing for the world championship.
He is the reigning boxing champion.
She became a champion at a young age.
Her determination helped her achieve her goals.
He showed great determination to finish the race.
The old book started to fall apart.
His life began to fall apart after the divorce.
He injured his knee playing basketball.
The scandal could injure his reputation.
The injured player was taken off the field.
He was seriously injured in the accident.
He suffered a minor injury during the game.
The company is liable for any injury caused by its products.
She is the captain of the soccer team.
The ship's captain guided them through the storm.
The plane's captain announced their descent.
Don't lose heart, you'll get better with practice.
He started to lose heart after several rejections.
The dancer moved with graceful movements.
She has a graceful way of speaking.
He demonstrated great strength by lifting the heavy weight.
Regular exercise builds physical strength.
The project was a complete failure.
He learned from his failures and tried again.
Don't give up on your dreams.
The enemy refused to give up.
Athletes from all over the world compete in the Olympics.
Businesses compete for customers.

explanation.meaning: 有道理；合乎情理；表述清楚
examples: What you're saying doesn't make sense.
His explanation made perfect sense to me.
He pretended not to hear me.
The children pretended to be superheroes.
She pretended to be asleep.
He pretended to know the answer.
Even if it rains, we'll still go for a walk.
Even though he was tired, he kept working.
The population of the city is over one million.
He won a million dollars in the lottery.
It's wrong to cheat on an exam.
He was caught cheating during the game.
He cheated her out of her money.
Don't try to cheat the system.
He used a clever cheat to win the game.
The con artist was a cheat.
The audience applauded loudly.
The play attracted a large audience.

explanation.meaning: 积极的；正面的；乐观的；肯定的
examples: She has a very positive attitude.
We received positive feedback on our presentation.
The test result was positive.
She has a very slim figure.
The chances of success are slim.
He's on a strict diet to lose weight.
A balanced diet is important for health.
She's been dieting for a month.
You don't need to diet, just eat healthy.
Every little bit helps to make a difference.
Your support can make a huge difference.
It's rather cold outside.
I'm rather busy at the moment.
We decided to walk rather than take a bus.
He chose to stay home rather than go to the party.
He does 50 push-ups every morning.
Push-ups are a good exercise for building arm strength.

explanation.meaning: 停止做（或使用、食用）；剪下
examples: You should cut out sugary drinks from your diet.
She cut out the picture from the magazine.
I go for a walk now and then.
He visits his grandparents now and then.
Compare this version with the original.
She compared her notes to mine.
I go for a jog every morning.
She jogs for half an hour before work.
He enjoys a light jog in the park.
He's under a lot of stress at work.
The exam caused her a lot of stress.
In the word 'present', the stress is on the first syllable when it's a noun.
The report stresses the importance of education.
You should stress the first syllable of the word.
The situation stressed him out.
She tends to stress over little things.
There was an error in the calculation.
He made a crucial error in the final minute of the game.
